sub_title: Passionate about empowering teams | Senior Director Philips | Building trusting Relationships in every direction, linking C-suite strategy to execution
summary: Experienced Leader with a demonstrated history of working in the hospital & health care industry.Skilled in working with boardroom / executive leadership and implementing transformations across the enterprise.

profile_positions.description: For our Enterprise Informatics business group, i lead the global PMO efforts for the Informatics Excellence team.
profile_positions.title: PMO leader Informatics Excellence

profile_positions.description: Building and leading the transformation/PMO team to drive the execution of the SaaS Factory programs, with clear targets on revenue and margin growth. Working with executive leaders across the Philips Enterprise, guiding multiple business, IT and Innovation teams and external cloud partners.
profile_positions.title: Transformation PMO leader SaaS Factory

profile_positions.description:
Building and leading the Global IT PMO-Portfolio team and implementing world class practices to enhance deployment effectiveness and benefits realisation. Aligning with Philips C-suite and driving execution across the Philips entreprise. 
IT is responsible to deliver on a global portfolio which covers 19 IT & BT transformation initiatives set up to drive End-2-End process standardization. The ambitions encompass full process standardisation across Philips and implementation of state-of-the art solutions to drive business productivity savings which will allow Philips  to improve business performance by 100bps on annual basis.
profile_positions.title: IT Portfolio Transformation Leader

profile_positions.description: Key activities encompass conceptualizing the audit approach & audit planning. Responsible for leading complex audits that provide value assurance to the Royal Philips Leadership team.  Partner to the businesses and Markets in a problem-solving environment using analytical and fact finding approaches to deliver results.Geographical focus on Greater China, Japan and ASEAN.
profile_positions.title: Senior Director & Head of internal audit Asia

profile_positions.description:
Driving and improving the global Strategic Plan alignment between the DI businesses and Markets. Managing and aligning across multiple functions and businesses to ensure a common and lean way of working across Health Systems.
Providing coaching and guidance on how to optimize Marketing plans and corresponding performance management and budgeting to both markets and businesses. 
Driving  High-Potential program across Philips to create the healthcare business leaders for the future.
profile_positions.title: Director Program Management for Diagnostic Imaging

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for Imaging Systems EMEA Marketing planning, processes, infrastructure, research and analysis, performance management and budgeting (total turnover over 1B€).
Overseeing project plans and timelines; monitoring of projects and triage when necessary to mitigate risks to schedule and budget. 
Active member of the EMEA Marketing MT, continuously pushing the progress and professional abilities of the team.
profile_positions.title: Senior Marketing Program Manager

profile_positions.description: Pro-actively provide strategic insight leading to timely and effective decision making. Collect, analyze and develop regional market data and forecasts. Assess the industry forces, its future trends and translate that into scenarios and recommendations to support the marketing strategies. Coordinate and support the market intelligence & marketing planning efforts in the Emerging Clusters & Regions.
profile_positions.title: Senior Market Intelligence Manager

profile_positions.description: Responsible for driving the definition, development and introduction of the global Power Solutions Portfolio by actively identifying & translating in-depth market, consumer and competitive analyses into winning concepts. Defining and monitoring profit margins of the portfolio. Managing international supply, purchasing and quality teams to ensure high quality product introductions and profitable margins.
profile_positions.title: Consumer Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for managing the Marketing Communication of the complete Power Solutions product portfolio. Responsible for operational and strategic contact with (creative) external parties.
Providing operational and strategic support to Global Marketing Manager Community.
Ad Interim Consumer Marketing Manager for Power Solutions. Managing the current portfolio and introducing new products into selected markets.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Communication Manager

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for of the set-up and implementation of a unified West-European Marketing Communication Strategy. Countries in scope were Benelux, France, Spain and Portugal. 
Managing the advert- and production coordinator (Two FTE’s) and responsible for operational and strategic contact with (creative) external parties.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Communication Manager
